org.red5.io.flv.impl
Class FLVWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.red5.io.flv.impl.FLVWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITagWriter
public class FLVWriter
extends Object
implements ITagWriter

A Writer is used to write the contents of a FLV file

Author:
The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Dominick Accattato (daccattato@gmail.com), Luke Hubbard, Codegent Ltd (luke@codegent.com), Tiago Jacobs (tiago@imdt.com.br), Paul Gregoire (mondain@gmail.com)

Constructor Summary
FLVWriter(File file, boolean append)
          Creates writer implementation with given file and last tag FLV.java uses this constructor so we have access to the file object
